name: NeoSmartBlinds
0:
”Alexa, open Kitchen's blinds”
”Alexa, close Study Room”
”Alexa, open Bedroom”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
To prepare for enabling this skill, it’s essential to ensure all your Smart Controllers and Wi-Fi blinds are online. You should be able to fully control your blinds using the Neo Smart Blinds app. You have to rename any room and scene in the Neo Smart Blinds app if they overlap with the names of other devices already in the Alexa app, facilitating a seamless setup. If any issues arise, troubleshoot them prior to proceeding.

For detailed guidance on the integration, voice control, and usage tips, including how to use groups and routines, visit our website (English online): neosmartblinds.com/smartcontroller-integrations/#scIntegrationAlexa

For any further questions or issues, feel free to contact us at tech@neosmartblinds.com.
